item.title: AngularFire 2 at the AngularJS Mountain View Meetup
item.description: “I’m building an Ionic 2 starter with social login using Firebase!” said hundreds of developers participating in the Ionic 2 beta. Yeah, I’m doing it as well. It’s not a bad idea. Usually, if your app uses online data your users will be required to login. Creating a starter app —– a set of code from which you can base a new application upon —– would certainly save time and effort creating new applications.
